title: First Bet
description: Place your first bet.

title: Betting Streak
description: Place at least one bet every day for 5 consecutive days.

title: Explorer
description: Place bets on 5 different sports.

title: Bet Type Master
description: Use every available bet type at least once.

title: Bankroll Builder
description: Grow your virtual bankroll to $1,000.

title: Winning Streak
description: Win 3 bets in a row.

title: Underdog Hunter
description: Correctly predict 5 underdog victories.

title: High Roller
description: Place a single bet with a stake of $100 or more.

title: Consistent Bettor
description: Place at least one bet every day for 30 consecutive days.

title: Sports Specialist
description: Place 20 bets on a single sport.

title: Bet Analyzer
description: Review and analyze 10 of your past bets.

title: Community Contributor
description: Participate in 5 discussions or share insights with other users.

title: Learning Enthusiast
description: Complete 3 educational modules or tutorials.

title: Playoff Predictor
description: Correctly predict the outcome of a playoff game.

title: Championship Winner
description: Correctly predict the winner of a championship or tournament.

title: Bankroll Manager
description: Maintain a positive bankroll for 30 consecutive days.

title: Risk Taker
description: Place a bet with odds of +500 or higher.

title: Conservative Bettor
description: Place 10 bets with odds of -200 or lower.

title: Break Even
description: Achieve a win rate of 50% or higher over 20 bets.

title: Profit Maker
description: Achieve a positive ROI over 50 bets.

title: Bet-ter Luck Next Time
description: Lose 5 bets in a row.

title: Superstitious Bettor
description: Place bets on 3 games involving teams with animal mascots.

title: Parlay Paralysis
description: Create a parlay with 5 or more legs and lose.

title: The Longest Shot
description: Bet on a team with odds of +1000 or higher.

title: Emotional Hedge
description: Bet on both sides of the same game.

title: The Hail Mary
description: Bet on a game-winning play in the final seconds.

title: The Underdog Whisperer
description: Correctly predict 3 underdog wins in a row.
